Load libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(fs)
library(network)
library(ergm)
library(ergm.count)
library(tictoc)
```

Build network

```{r}
dat <- out |> group_by(id) |>
  summarize(
    tot_con_occ = sum(tot_con_occ),
    tot_con_fat = sum(tot_con_fat),
    alsha_occ = sum(alsha_occ),
    alsha_fat = sum(alsha_fat),
    fatcon_occ = sum(fatcon_occ),
    fatcon_fat = sum(fatcon_fat),
    spi_m = mean(spi0),
    spi_max = max(spi0),
    spi_min = min(spi0),
    chirps_m = mean(chirps0),
    chirps_max = max(chirps0),
    chirps_min = min(chirps0),
    pop = mean(Pop2014UNFPA),
    urban = mean(Urban2014UNFPA),
    rural = mean(Rural2014UNFPA)
  )
```
